body: Missing the same change for guix?

> Missing the same change for guix?

:man_facepalming: 
Updated.

review ACK cb151b797aeabb376d37ef058aee34c06d36d487

While it is useful to sometimes have easy access to bench_bitcoin or the fuzz binary compiled with the release-build-system for testing purposes, I can see that shipping them does cost a lot of bandwidth.
